column2: # currently all the data is stored as a proportion, but we should make this into a binary at this point, given that reads can be so variable within a sample.
mutate_at(vars(V1:V302), funs(ifelse(.>0,1,0))) # binarize 302 for the 1% cutoff 208 for 5%
